entry.title: We're kicking off with the @MinaProtocol now 🔥 Join the space 👉 https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1djGXlQjoVXGZ?s=20
entry.summary:
We're kicking off with the @MinaProtocol now 🔥 Join the space 👉 https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1djGXlQjoVXGZ?s=20
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): All this ZK talk 👀, why not activate the build mode on @MinaProtocol? Join us on twitter space and meet the Mina team as we chat about zkApps ⛓️, building on Mina 🛠, and ofc how to get into the zkIgnite accelerator. Set reminders: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1djGXlQjoVXGZ https://t.co/VOTPZgofeR
